ygData.subject: Re: Level1-10s
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah they can group gate, gate self and Gate evacuate, exactly same as wiz, but one level lower and I think their gate are different places then wizards, which
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah they can group gate, gate self and Gate evacuate, exactly same as wiz,
but one level lower and I think their gate are different places then
wizards, which i read from some webpages are more dangerous. BUT they don't
get gate to alternate planes...If can wizards out of job liao

-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 09, 1999 10:20 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Level1-10s


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Talk abt Druid teleport ability, can they gate whole group? Can they
>portal to alternate plane? I know druid get teleport spells 1 lvl b4 we
>wiz but is it same for their portal spells, if they have any?
>
>On Thursday, 08 July, 1999 10:36 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
>wrote:
>> Druids are:
>>
>> 3rd best Cleric, 3 best DD caster, 3rd best DOT caster, 3rd best AC
>> buffer, 3rd base stat buffer, best damage shield, best teleport, best
>> utility spellcaster, 2nd best charmer (if it is a Wood Elf), 2nd
>> lousiest armor and 2nd lousiest HP.
>>
>> They also don't have any XP penalties
>>
>> Not a bad combo....
>>
>> If you want to stick to a druid, I'll help you collect high quality
>> pelts and get someone to make steel bonings so that you can get
>> reinforced leather armor.
>>
>> Leshrec wrote:
>>
>> > Talking bout druid, I was thinking of making one, maybe as a
>> > secondary character or a main one if I really like it. I think wolf
>> > form is cool, and druids get to teleport just as well as wizards, at
>> > one level earlier too. They get to heal,charm,dot and even have DD
>> > spells, although not as well as the specialist classes. Druids can
>> > also SoW and buff quite well... Well, if no one is gonna make a druid,
>> > i'll start one this weekend and see how it goes...
>> >
